ack.p: We thank professor Xuelu Wang and professor Chunmei Shi for help with laser fiber cutting; PTM bio ( https://www.ptmbiolabs.com/) for help with the proteome, Wuhan Metware Biotechnology ( https://www.metware.cn/) for help with the metabolome, and Anogene ( http://www.genome.cn/) for help with the single-cell transcriptome. Thanks to Dr. Kaining Hu for his help with bioinformatic analysis. We would like to thank Editage ( www.editage.cn) for English language editing.
